description:
At the law office of Flores, Tawney & Acosta P.C. in Las Cruces, New Mexico, we dedicate our time to helping clients achieve the justice they deserve following a serious injury or loss. When an accident happens due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, we are highly experienced in seeking compensation. We are also available for those suffering a violation of their fundamental rights as workers on the job.

With an additional office in El Paso, Texas, we serve a diverse range of clients throughout the region who seek the highest level of advocacy and support possible for their legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Wrongful death
  • Car and semi-truck accidents
  • Oilfield injuries
  • Workplace injuries
  • Medical malpractice
  • Product liability
  • Employment law, including discrimination, harassment, wrongful termination, and wage and hour disputes

Staffed by a team of vastly experienced trial lawyers, our law firm possesses the skills and resources necessary to handle your needs, and we promise to aggressively pursue the most favorable outcome on your behalf to help you obtain the compensation you need to support yourself and your family while you focus on your recovery.

Our firm believes careless negligence takes too many lives in New Mexico and Texas. We bring compassionate service and a drive to seek justice for clients who are facing the wrongful death of a loved one. We understand the stress and anxiety you are likely feeling, and we will always treat you and your family with respect and dignity.

We know no financial compensation will ever bring your loved one back. Our team members are ardent about seeking the maximum compensation you are owed to help pay for medical bills, funeral expenses, loss of insurance or financial support, and noneconomic damages such as mental suffering or loss of companionship.

You can count on us to remain by your side throughout the legal proceedings. We will address your questions and concerns while providing regular updates on the status of your case.

For a free evaluation from a local attorney you can trust, you can contact Flores, Tawney & Acosta P.C. by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule an appointment.
